attributes.action: Resume all Direct Flights to Sharm El Sheik From Uk NOW
attributes.additional_details: Prior to the Russian airline disaster of 2015, UK tourists constituted the second-highest percentage of visitors to Sharm. Loss of the UK market had a devastating impact on Egyptian workers, local businesses, and UK tour operators - and continues to do so. Over £20million has been invested in updated airport security and has been confirmed by the 'British the airport is now up to our safety standards. The resort itself is deemed to be safe. Almost every other European nation is flying. It's been almost 3 years. It's time to lift the 'ban
attributes.background: The UK is one of the only European nations refusing to lift its advisory against 'all but essential air travel to and from Sharm-El-Sheikh'. I am calling for the restrictions placed on one of the UK's best-loved destinations, especially by my family and friends here and in Sharm, to lift the ban NOW
